updates.name: Doug Engelbart
updates.checked: Take a bus or a train to a village or a town you have never visited to.
updates.description: Today I took a random bus to explore this city! Came across interesting stangers and bought him a cup of coffee. Feeling peaceful!

updates.name: Jennifer Miao
updates.checked: Say Hello to someone that you've never said to.
updates.description: Say hello to a mad neightbor, and gave him a smile. He seemed to calm down and tried smile back to me.

updates.name: Keiser Batman
updates.checked: Enjoy the scenery near where you live.

updates.name: Kiki K
updates.checked: Buy food for strangers who are in need.
updates.description: Bought an icecream for kids that are playing on the yard. :-)
